item.description:
Jimmy Wales will be in town next Tuesday, which is fortuitously about the right time for our biweekly meeting. I am trying to arrange for him to give a public talk that evening.

Let us plan to have a meetup, in any case, to followup on plans from last week, enjoy good food, and to figure out later whether it should be at a cafe or in a lecture hall on Harvard campus.
item.name: Evening meetup (with jwales?)
